remark.ch: 重修大一體育請至體育室教學組拿密碼卡

goal.en: (1) Exercise the body so that the physique and physical fitness can be fully developed. (2) Improve exercise skills, improve body use efficiency and safety and self-defense capabilities. (3) Improve the knowledge of sports and health care, and cultivate the ability of self-fitness and physical exercise. (4) Exercise injury prevention and sports safety. (5) Basic swimming skills and knowledge. (6) Various basic physical training methods. (7) The correct method and knowledge to engage in exercise
goal.ch: （一）鍛鍊身體，使體格與體能得以充分發展。 （二）提高運動技能，增進身體使用效率及安全自衛能力。 （三）增進運動與保健知識，培養自我健身及鍛鍊體能之能力。 （四）運動傷害預防及運動安全。 （五）游泳基本技能與知識。 （六）各種基本體能鍛鍊法。 （七）從事運動的正確方法與知識

content.en:
1. Walking and running: the basic characteristics and movements of short distance
2. Course introduction of interest options and ball games
3. Sports injury treatment and first aid: 1. Principles of sports injury treatment (PRICE); 2. Common injury treatment.
4. Mat sports: 1. Introduction 2. Basic mat activities 3. Main activities: rolling, balance, handstand, rollover 4. Enhance softness, coordination and sensitivity
5. Interval training: 1. History 2. Theoretical basis 3. Related terms 4. Prescription arrangement 5. Example application
Six. Medicine ball reinforcement: 1. Standing back-to-back turning pass 2. Standing back-to-back forward bending and overhead passing 3. Sitting sit-ups passing 4. Sitting forward and backward high throwing pass 5. Standing frontal high throwing pass 6. Stand with your back to the lob pass.
7. Cycle training: 1. Introduction 2. Training plan and management
8. Jump movement: 1. Long jump and triple jump characteristics 2. Long jump and triple jump techniques 3. Action essentials and precautions
9. Standing triple jump for boys, triple jump for girls and 100-meter test
10. Swimming: 1. Explanation of the frog-style leg movements: close the legs→turn the feet→kick the water→stretch; 2. Land exercises: sit, bend down, single-leg exercises; 3. Water exercises: hold the pool wall exercises, Practice leg movements with a kickboard.
Eleven. Swimming: 1. Frog leg movements in water: floating to practice leg movements, kicking the pool wall to practice leg movements. 2. Explanation of arm movements: row → retract and extend.
12. Swimming: 1. Arm movement exercises on land: stand upright and lean forward; 2. Exercises in water: practice in situ, walking in water, floating.
Thirteen. Swimming: 1. Explanation of the joint movement of the frog-style hands and feet: practice in water; 2. Explanation of the movement of breast-breast breathing: practice in situ in the water, practice of walking in the water.
14. Swimming: 1. Frog-style joint movement of hands and feet to practice in water; 2. Frog-style breathing movement to practice in situ in water, and practice to walk in water.
Fifteen. Swimming: 1. Review of the feet, hands, and combined movements of the frog pose; 2. Explanation of the complete frog pose: straighten the body → retract the legs → retract the hands → raise the head to breathe → straighten the body.
16. Technical test, general knowledge test (written test)
17. Teacher make-up exam week
18. Teachers can flexibly supplement teaching
content.ch:
一. 走跑運動：短距離的基本特質及動作
二. 興趣選項課程介紹及球類運動
三. 運動傷害處理與急救：1.運動傷害處理原則(PRICE)；2.常見傷害處置。
四. 墊上運動：1.簡介 2.基本墊上活動 3.主要活動：滾翻,平衡,倒立,側翻 4.加強柔軟度協調感及靈敏性
五. 間歇訓練：1.沿革 2.理論基礎 3.相關術語 4.處方編排 5.範例應用
六. 藥球補強：1.立姿背對背轉身傳球 2. 立姿背對背前彎與過頭傳球 3.坐姿仰臥起坐傳球 4.坐姿向前向後高拋傳球 5.站姿正面高拋傳球 6.站立背向高拋傳球。
七. 循環訓練：1.介紹 2.訓練計劃與管理
八. 跳部運動：1.跳遠及三級跳遠特性 2.跳遠及三級跳遠技術 3.動作要領及注意事項
九. 男生立定三級跳、女生立定三次跳及一百公尺測驗
十. 游泳：1.蛙式腿部動作講解：收腿→翻足→蹬夾水→伸直；2.陸上練習：坐姿、俯姿、單腳練習；3.水中練習：扶池壁練習、持浮板練習腿部動作。
十一. 游泳：1.蛙式腿部動作水中練習：漂浮練習腿部動作、蹬池壁練習腿部動作。 2.手臂動作講解：划→收、伸。
十二. 游泳：1.手臂動作陸上練習：身體直立、身體前傾；2.水中練習：原地練習、水中行走練習、漂浮練習。
十三. 游泳：1.蛙式手腳聯合動作講解：水中練習；2.蛙式換氣動作講解：水中原地練習、水中行走練習。
十四. 游泳：1.蛙式手腳聯合動作水中練習；2.蛙式換氣動作水中原地練習、水中行走練習。
十五. 游泳：1.蛙式腳部、手部、聯合動作複習；2.蛙式完整動作講解：伸直身體→收腿→收手→抬頭換氣→伸直身體。
十六. 術科測驗、常識測驗（筆試）
十七. 教師補考週
十八. 教師彈性補充教學

grading.en: General knowledge test: 20%, attendance, diligence and learning spirit: 20%, technical test: 60% (1. 40% for swimming 50 meters, 2. 10% for 100 meters, 3. 10% for standing triple jump
grading.ch: 常識測驗：20%、出席勤惰及學習精神：20%、術科測驗：60% (1.游泳五十公尺 40%、2. 100 公尺 10%、3.跳:男生立定三級跳、女生立定三次跳 10%
